name: Strategizer: Art of Defense
blurb: Real Time Strategy game, with base building, resource gathering, super weapons and more! DRM-Free for PC/Mac/Linux/iOS/Android/Facebook

rewards.reward: No Reward
(Approx. $3) \r\nFAN: You'll get a set of HD Wallpapers, and a big "Thank You!" You will also receive an email when the game is ready
PLAYER: You'll get 1 licensed digital download of the full game (Save 1/3 on launch price), 5 HD Wallpapers and email notifications on the games progress
PRO: 1 licensed digital download of the full game, 5 HD wallpapers, 3 Bonus levels, plus a Special Limited-Edition Kickstarter-only Avatar
(Approx. $30) ARTIST: Get all the PRO rewards, plus full Soundtrack and digital concept art.
(Approx. $30) GOODGUYGREG: Get all the PRO rewards, plus an EXTRA download license for a lucky friend!
(Approx. $33) BOXER: Get a boxed-up package of the game on disc, along with a sountrack CD, with 3 bonus levels, Kickstarter-only Avatar and 5 HD wallpapers.
Early-Bird SPY Special! All the rewards of the SPY for \u00a310 less!
(Approx. $52) SPY: Early access to BETA releases during testing! Plus, 1 licensed digital download of the full game, 5 HD wallpapers, 3 Bonus levels, plus a Limited Edition Kickstarter-only Avatar.

(Approx. $60) ARTISTE: All the SKINNER rewards, plus show the world you REALLY helped contribute to this game, in it from the start, with a 'kickstarter only' Limited Edition Set of 5x Skins for your Base and Towers, Full Soundtrack and concept art Digital Download Pack.
(Approx. $60) Early-Bird BADASS Special! All the rewards of the BADASS, for \u00a310 less!!

(Approx. $75) BADASS: Official 'Thank You' in credits. Early access to BETA releases during testing, 1x licensed digital downloads of the full game, Special 'Gold' Interface design, Limited Ed. Skin for Base/Towers, 3 bonus levels, full Soundtrack & concept art Digital download pack, plus a Limited Edition Kickstarter-only Avatar, Stickers Set, and also 5 HD wallpapers!
(Approx. $135) SQUADRON: Get all the rewards of the BADASS plus a total of 4 digital download licenses (Worth \u00a350) for friends or family.
BOXER2: All the perks of the BADASS but receive your game delivered to your door in a special limited edition metal case, including a CD of the soundtrack, and a T-Shirt chucked in for good measure!

(Approx. $150) DESIGNER: Design your very own level, with help from our team! You can even doodle something on Paint, and we will bring it to life to your specifications. PLUS!! Exclusive Chrome-effect User Interface design, Grenade LED/Pointer, PLUS! All of the rewards of the BADASS

(Approx. $240) MERCHANT: For those that really love to unwrap presents - get 2 copies of the game sent on disc in Limited Edition metal case (with special chrome user interace) CD of the full soundtrack, 3 x A3 Art prints, A set of Strategizer "Trumps" combat card game, Strategizer T-Shirt, coaster & mouse mat, Big grenade mug, 8GB Grenade USB stick, a VIP 'thank you' in the game credits, plus 3 bonus levels, 5 HD wallpapers, stickers and limited edition Avatar

"1OFAKIND" PACKAGE: Your game will come with a UNIQUE 1-OF-A-KIND Custom GUI interface design that will be individual to you. PLUS! Help design your very own Turret & Enemy & Level! Full name mention hard-coded into the Credits for all to see. Plus 3 download licenses, T-shirt, and all the rewards of the BADASS.
(Approx. $450) TURBO-MAMMOTH:\r\nFor the mammoth with the quickest fingers - get ALL of the rewards of the MAMMOTH tier, for \u00a3100/$150 less! First-come-first-serve

(Approx. $600) MAMMOTH: Help design an entire *Planet* including: up to 8 levels all using your ideas for design, custom scripts that trigger actions, decide on a theme for enemies and general story scripting. Take advantage of a 2 hour skype chat with the team, be it our Artist to learn some tricks, or whoever you'd like to speak to. Also get a VIP 'thank you' in the credits. PLUS!! Design your own Turret, Early access to Beta, 3x download licenses, Custom in-game GUI (1 of a kind just for you), Limited Edition base and tower skin set, 3 bonus levels, full soundtrack & concept art digitial download, Avatar, T-shirt, Strategizer "Trumps" combat card game, 8GB grenade USB stick, 3 x Stickers, wallpapers and auto-eligible for forum moderator privileges.
(Approx. $675) TURBO-MASTEROFTHEUNIVERSE:\r\nGet ALL of the rewards of the MASTEROFTHEUNIVERSE tier, for \u00a3200/$300 less!! First-come-first-serve

(Approx. $1,000) MASTEROFTHEUNIVERSE: Be in the game... Help us to design and name a character for the Campaign, either in your own liking, or just to your specification. Our artist will design the character however you want. A chance to supply audio for the character throughout the campaign, or use a professional voice actor. This package will immortalise you within the game forever!\r\nPlus! All the benefits of the MAMMOTH pack.

(Approx. $1880) GODOFWAR: Anyone generous enough to contribute such a sum towards our game - we would like to shake your hand in person, so invite you to join us for a launch Party. We have members of the team in the UK and US and while travel expenses won't be supplied - you can count on some VIP party treatment on either side of the pond! You will also be granted the right to help design your very own Turret to be used in the game by every player, your own planet of 8 levels, 2 enemies, a charcter in the campaign, and every other reward mentioned in the MASTEROFTHEUNIVERSE pack. Also add the team to Skype for daily contact and behind the scenes sneek peeks, and contribute feedback = play an active role in sculpting the finished product!

(Approx. $4000) [THE HERO] ... It's party time! Spend the weekend with the team for the launch party and we'll ONLY refer to you as "The Hero" for the entire duration because that's just what you'd be for pledging this much - we'll cover your accomodation and take care of everything (except transport). And whether you want to learn from the team, discuss our plans for our next game in top secret, or just get drunk and throw balls of paper at us - you can pretty much do what you want because you're The Hero, and you've achieved legendary status by pledging this amount. Ask and ye shall receive - send us a message, there is not much we will say no to for someone willing to help us this much - though please keep it clean :D \r\nPLUS! Be immortalised in the game and on our website forever, and everything else included in every other tier. \r\nLastly, you will make 1 small indie team the happiest guys (and girl) in the world, not to mention all of the other backers who will get to see this game get finished. Hence the name, The Hero.
